name: Ultra Ball
description:
A very high-grade BALL that offers
a higher POKéMON catch rate than
a GREAT BALL.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, quality BALL that offers
a higher POKéMON catch rate than
a standard POKé BALL.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A BALL thrown to catch a wild
POKéMON. It is designed in a
capsule style.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on WATER- and
BUG-type POKéMON.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on POKéMON
deep in the sea.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on weaker
POKéMON.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on POKéMON
caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description:
A comfortable BALL that makes a
captured wild POKéMON quickly grow
friendly.

name: Premier Ball
description:
A rare BALL that has been
specially made to commemorate an
event of some sort.

name: Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.

name: Antidote
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON from a
poisoning.

name: Burn Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON of a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a frozen POKéMON.

name: Awakening
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It awakens a sleeping POKéMON.

name: Paralyze Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON from
paralysis.

name: Full Restore
description:
A medicine that fully restores the
HP and heals any status problems
of one POKéMON.

name: Max Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It fully restores the HP of one
POKéMON.

name: Hyper Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 200 points.

name: Super Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Full Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
POKéMON, restoring HP by half the
maximum amount.

name: Max Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
POKéMON, restoring HP fully.

name: Fresh Water
description:
Water with a high mineral content.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Soda Pop
description:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 60 points.

name: Lemonade
description:
A very sweet drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 80 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description:
Highly nutritious milk.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 100 points.

name: Energy Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Energy Root
description:
A very bitter root.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 200 points.

name: Heal Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Revival Herb
description:
A very bitter medicinal herb.
It revives a fainted POKéMON,
restoring HP fully.

name: Ether
description:
Restores a selected move’s PP by
10 points for one POKéMON.

name: Max Ether
description:
Fully restores a selected move’s PP
for one POKéMON.

name: Elixir
description:
Restores the PP of all moves for
one POKéMON by 10 points each.

name: Max Elixir
description:
Fully restores the PP of all moves
for one POKéMON.

name: Lava Cookie
description:
LAVARIDGE TOWN’s local specialty.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Berry Juice
description:
A 100% pure juice.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.

name: Sacred Ash
description:
Revives all fainted POKéMON,
restoring HP fully.

name: HP Up
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base HP of one
POKéMON.

name: Protein
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base ATTACK stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Iron
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base DEFENSE stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Carbos
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SPEED stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SP. ATK stat
of one POKéMON.

name: Rare Candy
description:
A candy that is packed with energy.
It raises the level of a POKéMON
by one.

name: PP Up
description:
Slightly raises the maximum PP of
a selected move for one POKéMON.

name: Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SP. DEF stat
of one POKéMON.

name: PP Max
description:
Raises the PP of a selected move
to its maximum level for one
POKéMON.

name: Guard Spec.
description:
An item that prevents stat reduction
among party POKéMON for five turns
after use.

name: Dire Hit
description:
Raises the critical-hit ratio of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description:
Raises the ATTACK stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Defense
description:
Raises the DEFENSE stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description:
Raises the SPEED stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy
description:
Raises the accuracy stat of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Atk
description:
Raises the SP. ATK stat of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: Poké Doll
description:
An attractive doll.
Use it to flee from any battle with
a wild POKéMON.

name: Fluffy Tail
description:
An attractive item.
Use it to flee from any battle with
a wild POKéMON.

name: Blue Flute
description:
A blue glass flute that awakens
a sleeping POKéMON.

name: Yellow Flute
description:
A yellow glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of confusion.

name: Red Flute
description:
A red glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of infatuation.

name: Black Flute
description:
A black glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
less likely to appear.

name: White Flute
description:
A white glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
more likely to appear.

name: Shoal Salt
description:
Pure salt obtained from deep inside
the SHOAL CAVE. It is extremely
salty.

name: Shoal Shell
description:
A pretty seashell found deep inside
the SHOAL CAVE. It is striped in
blue and white.

name: Red Shard
description:
A small red shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Blue Shard
description:
A small blue shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Yellow Shard
description:
A small yellow shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Green Shard
description:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Super Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 200 steps.

name: Max Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 250 steps.

name: Escape Rope
description:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 100 steps.

name: Sun Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is as red as the sun.

name: Moon Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is as black as the night sky.

name: Fire Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is colored orange.

name: Thunder Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It has a thunderbolt pattern.

name: Water Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is a clear light blue.

name: Leaf Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

name: Tiny Mushroom
description:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is quite popular among certain
people.

name: Big Mushroom
description:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is very popular among certain
people.

name: Pearl
description:
A relatively small pearl that
sparkles in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply.

name: Big Pearl
description:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Stardust
description:
A pretty red sand with a loose,
silky feel.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Star Piece
description:
A shard of a pretty gem that
sparkles in a red color.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Nugget
description:
A nugget of pure gold that gives
off a lustrous gleam.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Heart Scale
description:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that
is extremely rare. It glows faintly
in the colors of a rainbow.

name: Root Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

name: Claw Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a claw.

name: Helix Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

name: Dome Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a shell.

name: Old Amber
description:
A piece of amber that contains
the genes of an ancient POKéMON.
It is clear with a reddish tint.

name: Cheri Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal paralysis.

name: Chesto Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to wake up.

name: Pecha Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to cure poison.

name: Rawst Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal a burn.

name: Aspear Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle for defrosting.

name: Leppa Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 10 PP.

name: Oran Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 10 HP.

name: Persim Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to lift confusion.

name: Lum Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal any problem.

name: Sitrus Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 30 HP.

name: Figy Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Wiki Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Mago Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Aguav Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Iapapa Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Razz Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Bluk Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Nanab Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Wepear Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pinap Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pomeg Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Kelpsy Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Qualot Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Hondew Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Grepa Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Tamato Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Cornn Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Magost Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Rabuta Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Nomel Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Spelon Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pamtre Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Watmel Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Durin Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Belue Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Liechi Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the ATTACK stat in a pinch.

name: Ganlon Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the DEFENSE stat in a pinch.

name: Salac Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SPEED stat in a pinch.

name: Petaya Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SP. ATK stat in a pinch.

name: Apicot Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SP. DEF stat in a pinch.

name: Lansat Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the critical-hit ratio in a pinch.

name: Starf Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it sharply
raises one stat in a pinch.

name: Enigma Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Bright Powder
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It casts a tricky glare that lowers
the opponent’s accuracy.

name: White Herb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It restores any lowered stat in
battle. It can be used only once.

name: Macho Brace
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It promotes strong growth but
lowers SPEED while it is held.

name: Quick Claw
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A light and sharp claw. The holder
may be able to strike first.

name: Soothe Bell
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A bell with a comforting chime that
makes the holder calm and friendly.

name: Mental Herb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It snaps the holder out of
infatuation. It can be used once.

name: Choice Band
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It powers up one move, which
becomes the only usable one.

name: King’s Rock
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It may cause the foe to flinch
upon taking damage.

name: Silver Powder
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A shiny silver powder that boosts
the power of BUG-type moves.

name: Amulet Coin
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It doubles the battle money if the
holding POKéMON takes part.

name: Cleanse Tag
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It repels wild POKéMON if the
holder is first in the party.

name: Deep Sea Tooth
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver.
It raises the SP. ATK stat.

name: Deep Sea Scale
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A scale that shines a faint pink.
It raises the SP. DEF stat.

name: Smoke Ball
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON can flee from
any wild POKéMON for sure.

name: Everstone
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON is prevented
from evolving.

name: Focus Band
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON may endure an
attack, leaving just 1 HP.

name: Lucky Egg
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
An egg filled with happiness that
earns extra EXP. points in battle.

name: Scope Lens
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A lens that boosts the critical-hit
ratio of the holding POKéMON.

name: Metal Coat
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A special metallic film that boosts
the power of STEEL-type moves.

name: Leftovers
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON gradually
regains HP during battle.

name: Dragon Scale
description:
A thick and tough scale.
A DRAGON-type POKéMON may be
holding it.

name: Light Ball
description:
An orb to be held by a PIKACHU
that raises the SP. ATK stat.
Touching it may cause a shock.

name: Soft Sand
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A loose, silky sand that boosts the
power of GROUND-type moves.

name: Hard Stone
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
An unbreakable stone that boosts
the power of ROCK-type moves.

name: Miracle Seed
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A seed imbued with life that boosts
the power of GRASS-type moves.

name: Black Glasses
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A shady-looking pair of glasses
that boosts DARK-type moves.

name: Black Belt
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A belt that boosts determination
and FIGHTING-type moves.

name: Magnet
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A powerful magnet that boosts the
power of ELECTRIC-type moves.

name: Mystic Water
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A teardrop-shaped gem that boosts
the power of WATER-type moves.

name: Sharp Beak
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A long, sharp beak that boosts the
power of FLYING-type moves.

name: Poison Barb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A small, poisonous barb that boosts
the power of POISON-type moves.

name: Never-Melt Ice
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts ICE-type moves.

name: Spell Tag
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A sinister, eerie tag that boosts
GHOST-type moves.

name: Twisted Spoon
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A spoon imbued with telekinetic
power boosts PSYCHIC-type moves.

name: Charcoal
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A combustible fuel that boosts the
power of FIRE-type moves.

name: Dragon Fang
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A hard and sharp fang that boosts
the power of DRAGON-type moves.

name: Silk Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A sumptuous scarf that boosts the
power of NORMAL-type moves.

name: Upgrade
description:
A transparent device filled with all
sorts of data.
It is made by SILPH CO.

name: Shell Bell
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON regains some
HP upon striking the foe.

name: Sea Incense
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It slightly boosts the power of
WATER-type moves.

name: Lax Incense
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
Its tricky aroma slightly reduces
the foe’s accuracy.

name: Lucky Punch
description:
A glove to be held by a CHANSEY.
It raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit
ratio.

name: Metal Powder
description:
A fine, hard powder to be held by
a DITTO.
It raises DITTO’s DEFENSE stat.

name: Thick Club
description:
A hard bone of some sort to be
held by a CUBONE or MAROWAK.
It raises the ATTACK stat.

name: Leek
description:
A stick of leek to be held by a
FARFETCH’D. It raises FARFETCH’D’s
critical-hit ratio.

name: Red Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
COOL condition in CONTESTS.

name: Blue Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
BEAUTY condition in CONTESTS.

name: Pink Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
CUTE condition in CONTESTS.

name: Green Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
SMART condition in CONTESTS.

name: Yellow Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
TOUGH condition in CONTESTS.

name: TM01
description:
An attack that is
executed last.
The user flinches
if hit beforehand.

name: TM02
description:
Sharp, huge claws
hook and slash the
foe quickly and
with great power.

name: TM03
description:
An attack with a
pulsing blast of
water. It may also
confuse the foe.

name: TM04
description:
The user focuses
its mind to raise
the SP. ATK and
SP. DEF stats.

name: TM05
description:
The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

name: TM06
description:
A move that badly
poisons the foe.
Its poison damage
worsens every turn.

name: TM07
description:
A hailstorm lasting
five turns damages
all POKéMON except
the ICE-type.

name: TM08
description:
The user bulks up
its body to boost
both its ATTACK and
DEFENSE stats.

name: TM09
description:
The user shoots
seeds at the foe.
Two to five seeds
are shot at once.

name: TM10
description:
An attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the user.

name: TM11
description:
The sun blazes for
five turns, powering
up FIRE-type
moves.

name: TM12
description:
The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use
only attack moves.

name: TM13
description:
The foe is struck
with an icy beam.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

name: TM14
description:
The foe is blasted
with a blizzard.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

name: TM15
description:
A severely damaging
attack that makes
the user rest on
the next turn.

name: TM16
description:
A wall of light
cuts damage from
SP. ATK attacks
for five turns.

name: TM17
description:
Enables the user to
evade all attacks.
It may fail if used
in succession.

name: TM18
description:
A heavy rain falls
for five turns,
powering up WATER-
type moves.

name: TM19
description:
A harsh attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

name: TM20
description:
It protects the
user’s party from
all status problems
for five turns.

name: TM21
description:
This attack move
grows more powerful
the less the user
likes its TRAINER.

name: TM22
description:
A 2-turn move that
blasts the foe with
absorbed energy in
the 2nd turn.

name: TM23
description:
An attack with a
steel-hard tail.
It may lower the
foe’s DEFENSE stat.

name: TM24
description:
A strong electrical
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: TM25
description:
A brutal lightning
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: TM26
description:
An earthquake that
strikes all POKéMON
in battle excluding
the user.

name: TM27
description:
This attack move
grows more powerful
the more the user
likes its TRAINER.

name: TM28
description:
An attack that hits
on the 2nd turn.
Can also be used
to exit dungeons.

name: TM29
description:
A strong telekinetic
attack. It may also
lower the foe’s
SP. DEF stat.

name: TM30
description:
A shadowy blob is
hurled at the foe.
May also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

name: TM31
description:
An attack that also
breaks any barrier
like LIGHT SCREEN
and REFLECT.

name: TM32
description:
The user creates
illusory copies of
itself to raise its
evasiveness.

name: TM33
description:
A wall of light
cuts damage from
physical attacks
for five turns.

name: TM34
description:
A rapid jolt of
electricity strikes
the foe. It can’t
be evaded.

name: TM35
description:
The foe is scorched
with intense flames.
The foe may suffer
a burn.

name: TM36
description:
Filthy sludge is
hurled at the foe.
It may poison the
target.

name: TM37
description:
A 5-turn sandstorm
that damages all
types except ROCK,
GROUND, and STEEL.

name: TM38
description:
The foe is hit with
an intense flame.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

name: TM39
description:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
SPEED if it hits.

name: TM40
description:
An extremely fast
attack against one
target. It can’t be
evaded.

name: TM41
description:
It enrages the foe,
making it incapable
of using the same
move successively.

name: TM42
description:
An attack that is
boosted if user is
burned, poisoned,
or paralyzed.

name: TM43
description:
An attack that may
have an additional
effect that varies
with the terrain.

name: TM44
description:
The user sleeps for
two turns to fully
restore HP and heal
any status problem.

name: TM45
description:
If it is the other
gender, the foe is
made infatuated and
unlikely to attack.

name: TM46
description:
An attack that may
take the foe’s held
item if the user
isn’t holding one.

name: TM47
description:
The foe is hit with
wings of steel.
It may also raise
the user’s DEFENSE.

name: TM48
description:
The user employs
its psychic power
to swap abilities
with the foe.

name: TM49
description:
Steals the effects
of the foe’s
healing or status-
changing move.

name: TM50
description:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.

name: Orange Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
ZIGZAGOON print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Harbor Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
WINGULL print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Glitter Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
PIKACHU print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Mech Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
MAGNEMITE print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Wood Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
SLAKOTH print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Wave Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
WAILMER print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Bead Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL to be held by a
POKéMON. It will bear the print of
the POKéMON holding it.

name: Shadow Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
DUSKULL print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Tropic Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
BELLOSSOM print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Dream Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL to be held by a
POKéMON. It will bear the print of
the POKéMON holding it.

name: Fab Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a
gorgeous, extravagant print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.
